name: Space Arcade (Taldariner)
description:
Simple endless runner in which you have to take on the role of a passenger in an escape pod and try to fly to your rescue. However, the truth is that there is no salvation and you only have eternity wander through the endless spaces of space.

Special thanks:

Nikolay Kruglov for his help in creating sprites.

Anton Vilgotsky for his help in creating sprites and writing the soundtrack for the game.

Yuri Obraztsov for moral support and game testing.
